snippet: KENNEDY--Richard, on May 15, 2016. Senior Director at Cushman & Wakefield. His funeral services will be held on May 19, 2016 at Crestwood Funeral Home, 445 West 43rd Street, 2-4pm and 5-8pm. Mass will be held at Saint Patrick's Cathedral, Fifth Ave., on May 20, 2016 at 10am. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KENNEDY--Richard, on May 15, 2016. Senior Director at Cushman & Wakefield. His funeral services will be held on May 19, 2016 at Crestwood Funeral Home, 445 West 43rd Street, 2-4pm and 5-8pm. Mass will be held at Saint Patrick's Cathedral, Fifth Ave., on May 20, 2016 at 10am. 1/3
